creator: belial
description:
{RHelp Topic{W: Malyki{x

Malyki is the God of War. He enjoys warfare, not killing but the art and
stratedgy of it. He likes it so much that he is constantly trying to start a
war just so he can revel in it. Malyki believes in the rules of warfare, and
even though he creates much destruction he does it in a orderly way. Aludra
and Selucia usually team up against him because they find his past time a
senseless waste of time. Malyki on the other hand does not seem to like or
dislike either of them and is only irritated by their constant interferance
with his plans. Caerdik on the other hand he just doesn't like. There is no
reason for his hatred of Caerdik, he just doesn't like him. Nephium is known
to work with Malyki on occasion when Nephium deems the world to be too
overpopulated. Most of Malyki's followers are soldiers and specialize in
combat spells, both offensive and defensive.
